items.sentence: I've never been to Boston, and I don't intend to ever go there.
Tom wasn't angry about that. He was angry about something else.
Tom survived, even though all the other passengers were killed.
I can speak a little French, but I'm still not very good at it.
I thought it was just going to be another boring day at school.
Tom was going to shave his head, but Mary talked him out of it.
My father makes it a rule to get up at six, even in the winter.
Tom's parents said they wouldn't let him go to Australia alone.
I suspect Tom and Mary didn't leave when they were supposed to.
I used to work in the hospital across the street from my house.
A man's worth lies not so much in what he has as in what he is.
That teacher sometimes hits his students, but no one complains.
Tom said that he was going back to the hospital this afternoon.
Tom doesn't need to tell Mary anything that he doesn't want to.
You ought to tell Tom that you're planning on joining the team.
I want to introduce you to the man I spoke about the other day.
I wanted to go to the beach today, but then it started to rain.
The doctor said that I should be able to walk again by October.
I'm not feeling well and I think that I should stay home today.
Instead of going to the gym, I walk to and from work every day.
